function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Demolition waste in landfills creating favorable breeding conditions for mosquitoes","Impact":"Risk of vector-borne diseases (VBDs) may increase","Mitigation":"Implement proper waste management practices and promote recycling and upcycling of construction and demolition waste","Technologies":"Waste sorting and recycling technologies","People":"Built environment professionals, waste management authorities","Owner":"Built environment professionals, waste management authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness on the link between demolition waste management and risk of VBDs","Impact":"Increase in risk of VBDs due to lack of informed decision-making","Mitigation":"Develop decision support systems to promote awareness and provide actionable insights to built environment professionals","Technologies":"Decision support systems, data analytics, and visualization tools","People":"Built environment professionals","Owner":"Researchers, technology developers"},{"Description":"Urbanization leading to increased impact on health","Impact":"Higher risk of health issues, including vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Adopt a health-centric approach to designing and constructing the built environment, as encouraged by the New Urban Agenda (NUA)","Technologies":"Health-focused design principles, urban planning tools","People":"Urban planners, architects, policymakers","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, policymakers"}]}
